interface.name: FatAttr
interface.summary: Fatattr: Display or change attributes on a filesystem
interface.description: fatattr displays or changes attributes on an MS-DOS FAT filesystem. If only a list of diles (or directories) are given, it displays the attributes for those files or directories. If given a list of attributes, it will add (+) or remove (-) the specified attributes from the given list of files or directories.

entry-point.name: Fatattr
entry-point.summary: fatattr: Display or change attributes on a FAT filesystem
entry-point.description: fatattr displays or changes attributes on an MS-DOS FAT filesystem. If only a list of diles (or directories) are given, it displays the attributes for those files or directories. If given a list of attributes, it will add (+) or remove (-) the specified attributes from the given list of files or directories.
